update vorder
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update vorder set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, otype = #{otype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oprice = #{oprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ointegral = #{ointegral,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, otime = #{otime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_id = #{transactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_end = #{timeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from vorder where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = "1" order by otime desc
select vid from vorder where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status = "1"

from vorder where out_trade_no = #{tradeNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
